text: He found a wolf on a goat grazing on the edge of a precipice. When he could not get to her, he said, "Woman, get down, for you may fall there. Besides, look at this meadow where I am, it's green and well grown. And the goat said to him, I know that thou hast not invited me to eat, but that thou hast invited me, and I am thy dish. Don't let the bad guys get you by their tricks.
title: El lobo y la cabra
author: nan Esopo
